Topic.Title: eBay's user interface is terrible

Topic.Title: WORLD CRASH IS COMING !!!!!!!

Topic.Title: almost hit $52 already: timbeeeerrrr on $19% growth in rev & PROFITS

Message.Msg: bwahhh haha, it's not growth, it's increased fees on merchants, like the final value fees they charge on shipping portion of a transaction since last year. Of course the bottom line is going to look good with increased fees. Unfortunately, eBay has squeezed the lemon dry. This new round of fee changes is going to #$%$ of a lot of high end sellers who will leave for Amazon in the coming months. davidba1960, instead of filling this board with eBay hope, why not try selling something from your garage or around the house on eBay and see exactly how much they charge + Paypal skim.... You're in for a real surprise and then maybe you'll realize why eBay is destined for failure.

Topic.Title: eBay's user interface is terrible

Message.Msg: Have you used eBay recently? It's not like that anymore, huge changes over the last few years.

Topic.Title: How can forecast of 15% growth for next Q: cause Ebay to drop $3.20 or 6% or back to $52s?

Message.Msg: I personally think investors were just looking for a reason to take profits...like you said few weeks ago things looked great and then earnings fall a little short (yet full year estimate is same) and stock drops $3. I think the fact that the general market was also down big the last few sessions played into it as well just making investors that had profits hit the cash register sooner. I for one took this as an opportunity to get more shares as well as some call options for the next 6 months and expect ebay to slowly climb its way back to the upper 50's if not higher. But then again I still have to go to work every day so what do i know!!!!!
